recipe.title: Bitty Banana Breakfast Baby Food (7+ Months) Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: 8 oz ; baby oatmeal, prepared and cooled ; (230 g)
water, can use breast milk or formula

steps.step: Prepare baby oatmeal and allow to cool.
Add bananas, apples, baby oatmeal, and water, breast milk, or formula to a blender or food processor. Blend very well.
Refrigerate up to 4 days or freeze up to 1 month.
NOTE: Check with your pediatrician before introducing new foods to children under 12 months.

steps_updated.steps_updated: Prepare baby oatmeal and allow to cool.
Add bananas, apples, baby oatmeal, and water, breast milk, or formula to a blender or food processor.
Refrigerate up to 4 days or freeze up to 1 month.
NOTE: Check with your pediatrician before introducing new foods to children under 12 months.
